text: The CTA tool: Add the possibility to _preset subject line_; right now you can’t even customise the mailto with the External url, because it will automatically switch to Email address!

Hi I've recently done that and it worked - just pasted the full mailto link with the parameters and values I needed. Eg. <mailto:recipient@email.com?cc=recipientcc>@email.com&subject=Your%20subject&body=The%20email%20message%20in%20the%20body%0ACheers!

<@UPK28EM89> Can you also xpost this to the ideas forum and then place a link back here for other to vote on the idea
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage>
<@UEC4VECRG> Did you copy the whole string and paste? When I wrote, or tried to paste it automatically switch, but I didn’t paste the whole thing

I pasted the whole thing with "URL" selected above - when I now go to the CTA and edit, it defaulted to "Email", but still carried the parameters and once on a page or email the CTA works and does the mailto it's supposed to do
:bulb: *Module UX Boolean Tweak:* Align the toggle to the left to avoid weird layouts when boolean text is super long
